synonyms.synonym: Factor VIIIa heavy chain, 200 kDa isoform
Factor VIIIa heavy chain, 92 kDa isoform

protein.specific_function: Factor VIII, along with calcium and phospholipid, acts as a cofactor for factor IXa when it converts factor X to the activated form, factor Xa
